title: Bug 5340 Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: The system does not respond when the user cancels adding an exception breakpoint. The breakpoint is still added despite the cancellation.
EB: The system should not add the exception breakpoint when the user cancels the operation.
SR:
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 
2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
